title: Portfolio
descriptionCards: This application is designed for effective learning through flashcards that contain questions and answers. Users can create their own sets of flashcards or utilize pre-made decks. The application also allows adding images and videos to the flashcards to enhance information retention.
descriptionCheckFlow: The "Check Flow" project provides a convenient interface for creating, editing, deleting, and displaying tasks and to-do lists. Users can easily add new tasks, set their completion status.
